name: Glitter Arena | Never Mind Games Jam #3
name_original: Glitter Arena | Never Mind Games Jam #3
description:
Game Jam theme 

It spreads

Controls 
  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse click to fire power ups
  • Alt+F4 to close
Gameplay
  • Drive around spreading your team's glitter color.
  • Driving over glitter destroys it (including your own).
  • Glitter bomb power up spreads more glitter.
  • Freeze ray power up freezes opponents.

First multiplayer game, not even sure it works outside of our build environment. But you can still drive around and get a feel for how the game was going to work.
